# <a name="how-to-attach-files-in-outlook-on-the-web"></a><span data-ttu-id="b1d00-102">如何在 web 上的 Outlook 中附加文件</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b1d00-102">How to attach files in Outlook on the web</span></span>

1. <span data-ttu-id="b1d00-103">在邮件或日历事件的底部, 选择回形针图标</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b1d00-103">At the bottom of a message or calendar event, select the paperclip icon</span></span> <img src='data:image/png;base64,' />
<span data-ttu-id="b1d00-104">.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b1d00-104"></span></span>
1. <span data-ttu-id="b1d00-105">选择 "**浏览此计算机**" 以在你的计算机上附加文件, 或**浏览云位置**以附加一个联机文件。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b1d00-105">Select **Browse this computer** to attach a file on your computer or **Browse cloud locations** to attach an online file.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b1d00-106">若要了解详细信息, 请参阅在[web 上的 Outlook 中附加文件](https://support.office.com/article/48b8dca1-7a76-43ce-97d1-e1cf73893f55)。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b1d00-106">To learn more, see [Attach files in Outlook on the web](https://support.office.com/article/48b8dca1-7a76-43ce-97d1-e1cf73893f55).</span></span>
